2025.title: Consensus Hong Kong 2025
2025.description: Billed as 'Super Bowl of Blockchain,' Consensus Hong Kong (Feb 18‑20) focuses on bridging East‑West markets for digital assets and Web3.

2025.title: Next Block Expo 2025
2025.description: Europe's major Web3 expo held March 19‑20, 2025 in Warsaw, drawing startups, investors, and developers for networking and showcase.

2025.title: Global Blockchain Show Riyadh
2025.description: Premier blockchain conference in Riyadh June 23‑24, 2025, covering DeFi, NFTs, enterprise tech, and digital assets.

2025.title: Token2049 in Dubai & Singapore
2025.description: Key 2025 event for global digital asset leaders, held Apr 30‑May 1 in Dubai and Oct 1‑2 in Singapore—with deep DeFi and policy talks.

2025.title: Paris Blockchain Week 2025
2025.description: Global Web3 & open finance event at Carrousel du Louvre Apr 8‑10, 2025, with 9K+ attendees, covering policy, enterprise, and NFTs.
